message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects that.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your perspective on the price. While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.
